problem_data.title: Construct the Rectangle
problem_data.description:
A web developer needs to know how to design a web page's size. So, given a specific rectangular web page’s area, your job by now is to design a rectangular web page, whose length L and width W satisfy the following requirements:

The area of the rectangular web page you designed must equal to the given target area.
The width W should not be larger than the length L, which means L >= W.
The difference between length L and width W should be as small as possible.
Return an array [L, W] where L and W are the length and width of the web page you designed in sequence.

examples.explanation:
The target area is 4, and all the possible ways to construct it are [1,4], [2,2], [4,1].
But according to requirement 2, [1,4] is illegal; according to requirement 3, [4,1] is not optimal compared to [2,2]. So the length L is 2, and the width W is 2.

experiment_result.runlog:
[測試#1] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(1,)
  標準輸出: [1, 1]
  你的輸出: [1, 1]

[測試#2] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(13,)
  標準輸出: [13, 1]
  你的輸出: [13, 1]

[測試#3] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(999999937,)
  標準輸出: [999999937, 1]
  你的輸出: [999999937, 1]

[測試#4] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(6,)
  標準輸出: [3, 2]
  你的輸出: [3, 2]

[測試#5] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(12,)
  標準輸出: [4, 3]
  你的輸出: [4, 3]

[測試#6] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(16,)
  標準輸出: [4, 4]
  你的輸出: [4, 4]

[測試#7] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(1000000000,)
  標準輸出: [32000, 31250]
  你的輸出: [32000, 31250]

[測試#8] ✅ 通過
  標準輸入: constructRectangle(2,)
  標準輸出: [2, 1]
  你的輸出: [2, 1]

=== 測試完成 (8/8) ===
[成功] 所有測資通過 ✅（0.0010s）
